[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [CommonVersionsConfiguration](./rush-lib.commonversionsconfiguration.md) &gt; [ensureConsistentVersions](./rush-lib.commonversionsconfiguration.ensureconsistentversions.md)

## CommonVersionsConfiguration.ensureConsistentVersions property

If true, then consistent version specifiers for dependencies will be enforced. I.e. "rush check" is run before some commands.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly ensureConsistentVersions: boolean;
```
